text: Pretty in Pink is a 1986 romantic comedy movie. It was directed by Howard Deutch and written by John Hughes. Actors include: Molly Ringwald, Harry Dean Stanton, Jon Cryer, Annie Potts, James Spader, and Andrew McCarthy. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Deutch
title: Pretty in Pink
